DESCRIPTION: Ative ou desative as mensagens de despedida!
FORM_1: Olá {{author}}! Em qual canal as mensagens de despedida serão enviadas? (mencione um canal)
FORM_3: It works! Do you want a great goodbye image to be sent too? Answer with "yes" or "no"!
FORM_SUCCESS: Goodbye messages enabled in {{channel}} ! Type `{{prefix}}goodbye test` to test the goodbye message!
MAX_CHARACT: Your message must not exceed 1800 characters!
DISABLED: Goodbye messages have just been disabled! Type `{{prefix}}configuration` to see the new configuration!
TITLE: GOODBYE
